name: Scarlet Manor: The Heir
description: Unravel the mystery of the Scarlet Manor! Embark on a 2D point and click horror journey, solving complex puzzles and uncovering the secrets hidden behind the walls of the mansion. The Manor awaits you.

name: Souls Survivors
description: Fight hordes of enemies, face unique bosses, learn powerful abilities, and explore a huge and diverse map. Souls Survivors combines Hack&Slash mechanics with Roguelite elements and gives you a straightforward and easy to understand yet deep and complex Action RPG game.

name: Snow Blocks 2
description: In the game you will find many levels of varying difficulty and different blocks that you have to destroy! Read the game from start to finish, solving interesting puzzles! Whether you can walk this path depends only on you!

name: Space Gun
description: Space Gun is an exciting physics puzzle game in which fun and exciting levels of varying difficulty await you. Plunge into the space age of technology and take control of a killer gun and destroy everything in your path! The game features many unique buildings and levels, so complete them all!

name: Fallen Overlord
description:
Dare to challenge one of the hardest games ever?! Beat the 99 floors and face the king on the 100th floor!

The game includes a leaderboard for you to share your score with the whole world!

name: Suburban Footy League
description: In a town like yours the ultimate football adventure is about to begin.

name: Space Threat
description: Drive through beautiful locations and dangerous roads, but be careful and avoid obstacles! Be prepared for anything and prove that you can withstand any situation!

name: TrainTastic
description: TrainTastic is a shared screen fighting game where you battle up to three friends playing many different types of trains! See who can dominate the arenas in a variety of themes to find out who truly is, TrainTastic!

name: Tracks n' Turrets
description: Get ready to embark on an exciting strategy adventure in a fantasy world where mobility and strategic planning are essential for survival. Prepare to defend your kingdoms on the move in "Tracks 'n' Turrets"!

name: The Dungeon
description: In the dungeon, a legendary endless treasure awaits. Countless brave adventurers have come, but none have unveiled its secrets. Monsters and traps fill the dungeon. Are you courageous enough to conquer them and claim the final treasure?

name: Unusual Quest
description: The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. You have to go through many levels, completing certain tasks and destroy enemies in the location.

name: Up Square
description: Up Square: A minimalistic, physics based, precision platformer, with unique biomes. Climb to the top of the leaderboard, complete difficult challenges for achievements and challenge your friends in various game modes!

name: Villa Escape
description: Escape room game set in a medieval village in Castile and its old mysteries that remain hidden to this day. A puzzle game to test your intellect and intuition.

name: Kingdom Idle Heart
description: This is a medieval style, management+development hang up game.

name: Coin Toss Rainbow Simulator
description: Coin Toss Rainbow Simulator. Made in Hong Kong. Toss the coin and test your luck. By Unreal Engine 5.3.1.

name: Alligori
description: The land of Alligori needs a new king, and you've been requested to take over your grandfathers kingdom! Build your kingdom up from a village, to a town, city, and finally a kingdom. Delve into dungeons with puzzle-themed weapons, face epic bosses, and craft rings and amulets to help along the way!

name: Ctrl-U
description: Ctrl-U is a science fiction parkour adventure with FPS elements, set in a huge industrial plant. You are Kyle (KY-13 Auxiliary Unit), a highly advanced android whose agility allows him to quickly reach any area of the factory to solve a variety of unforeseen problems.

name: Coopbots
description: 2 cute robots on a treasure hunt in a mysterious sci-fi pyramid. Coopbots is a fun 2-player online co-op puzzle game. Players solve puzzles together and overcome platform elements to solve the mysteries of the pyramid and find a treasure or two.

name: Blyx
description: Blyx is a story-driven action-adventure game, where you can discover new worlds and fight with complex bosses. Solve interesting puzzles, jump between platforms, and battle enemies – all to help Blyx find his purpose among the realms.

name: AstroRunner
description: AstroRunner - 3D runner game, in which you control a self-driving robot to safely collect scattered solar panels from a remote location. Collect as many parts as possible and increase the mileage of your pedometer.

name: Cavern
description: Edit the Level as you play in Cavern, a Roguelike Puzzler. Select an object to open up the - SWAP MENU - and swap it out for another type. Turn a slime into a key. Or a rock into a bomb to clear your path. Even intercept bullets in mid air and send them back against enemies.

name: Creepshow
description: Creepshow is a video game based off the horror comedy anthology series that began in 1982.

name: Funeral Toll
description: A bloody war has caused the dungeons to explode with an incursion of prisoners, but this has lead to an excess of torture and violence. Now the dungeons are abandoned, and those who are left behind in the darkness are waiting for adventurers to meet their nightmares.

name: Bite Size Terrors: Eye Candy
description: The Other Side of the Screen Shows a Truly Disturbing Truth.

name: Antireal
description: Sin descripción

name: Staring Time
description: A psychological horror game.

name: Repose
description: Repose is an upcoming dark exploration/puzzle game. In Repose, explore, fight, and maintain a healthy sleep schedule as you descend the twisted levels of the corporation that hired you for unknown reasons.

name: Tree of Ashes
description: Tree of Ashes is a 2D bullet heaven game set in a dark post-apocalyptic fantasy world. You play as an emissary of an ancient AI tree that sends you out onto the banished land in hopes of fighting off the evil, returning the world to its peaceful state.

name: Terrorween Playdate Bundle
description:
Bubble, Bubble, Toil, and Trouble: cranks undocked & prepare for a struggle.

Wicked souls unite! There's a spook in the air this October. Welcome to the Terrorween Bundle. Be delighted with 8 eerie-sistible games with a touch of the Halloween spirit!

Don't let this spooktacular bundle slip away. Missing it would be a monster of a mistake.

name: Five Nights at Treasure Island: Room Zero
description: Five Nights at Treasure Island: Room Zero is the upcoming Five Nights at Treasure Island and Five Nights at Freddy's fan-game

name: Aquatia
description: Dive into Aquatia, a third-person anime-action RPG game, where you'll become the master of water magic. Experience the graceful aqua ballet, using water magic to defeat monsters with finesse.

name: Arcanora
description: Step into the mystical realm of Arcanora, a rogue-lite magical adventure! where darkness shrouds a labyrinthine world. Battle hordes of ferocious spiders using an arsenal of diverse staffs. How many waves can you endure before the unyielding arachnid surge overwhelms you?

name: Bargain Puzzle Grid
description: A Casual But Challenging Puzzle Grid. Roll and Rotate Column's and Rows of Cube's to Make islands of like cube's. You try to get the highest board score you can. it has a familiar feel of classic puzzles

name: Cutie Crowd Control
description: A funny physics puzzle game where you play as a sheepdog desperately trying to save your sheep from silly traps that knock them out in funny and surprisingly complicated ways. Meet cute animals, save them from themselves, or don't and just cause mayhem.

name: Eerie Desolation
description: A phycological open world paranormal investigation game. You and up to 3 friends can traverse the cursed and lost town of Willows Creek as you tread to free the paranormal that are stuck between planes of existence. Free the souls so you can free yourself from Solmeloks evil curse.

name: FoMO
description: FoMo is a psychological and first person horror game where inexplicable events throw your boring life off track. Walk between your destroyed neighborhood and bloody workplace, go through labyrinths, be stealthy and avoid the monsters. Struggle to survive as you look for a way out.

name: Fish Flop
description: Fish Flop is a fun, physics-based adventure where one fish must escape a fish market, and get back home to the sea!

name: Goblin's Die
description: Goblin’s Die is an Action-Adventure co-op game for 1-4 players with a comical twist. Jump in the boots of a common goblin to gather resources, craft equipment and strengthen your hive to help you battle enemies and explore the world.

name: Gaula Survival
description: A third-person survival game, explore territories and settle in. Surviving this hostile world is the name of the game.

name: Freestyle Studio
description: Rap battle others, practice your freestyling skills, advance in the rapping community. Freestyle Studio is a fun way to practice your rapping skills, whether that be alone or against others.

name: Hyperrail Detective
description: Find clues, build a team, and battle your way through the train to unravel the mysteries of the Hyperrail.

name: Grim Potions
description: Immerse yourself in the magical world of "Grim Potions," where, as an alchemist, you use special dice to create mystical elixirs. Manage an apothecary shop, serving diverse heroes, and aspire to become a legendary alchemist.

name: Last Day Lockdown
description: Bid farewell to the mundane and embrace the extraordinary as you step into "Last Day Lockdown," a thrilling office escape puzzle that transforms your farewell into an unforgettable journey!

name: Katsl
description: Welcome to Katsl, the island town for cats! Unleash your inner architect and craft cozy nooks for your adorable kittizens. Dive into their world, discover their dreams and quirks, and weave them into your feline tale. Time to unwind and let your paw-some adventure begin!

name: Mansion At Midnight
description: You are trapped in a haunted mansion with only your wits and your friends beside you. Search the mansion for a means to defend yourself from the horrors that wander through its halls. Be warned, this mansion seems alive, and some of these items carry a terrible curse.

name: Marshmallows On Halloween
description: It's Halloween night.

name: Know
description: "Know" is a cute, eerie, and slightly melancholic adventure game. Explore, evade "Kaiubutsu" (monsters), and uncover the secrets of this world!

name: Odyssey Island
description: Odyssey Island is a punchy party-based action RPG. Fight dangerous beasts, go fishing, argue about the meaning of family, commit crimes or simply chill on deck with your new-found crew.

name: Mineblast
description: Destroy whole levels using TNTs and have fun with the physics of Mineblast.

name: Resurrect
description: Journey a haunted map, strategizing card duels. Balance life and hunger, aided by an evolving monster ally. Face the final boss; master the abyss or be devoured.

name: Prostitute Island
description: Build the best love hotel in the world and have tons of sex every day!

name: Shattered Lands
description: Simplified real time strategy game where you lead an island expedition. The player can take direct control of a hero on the battlefield and fight enemies head on! Choose between various heroes with unique abilities and playstyles. Conquer the mysterious islands for the kingdom!

name: Spooky Dwellers: Collector's Edition
description: Unleash the power of the talismans of light, cast out lurking spirits, and transform Grandma's haunted house into the ultimate Halloween party destination!

name: Silkbulb Test
description: Take the test!

name: Sunken Stones
description: A turn based Puzzle-Strategy game about pirates and cursed treasure. Choose a captain, gather your crew and defeat monsters by strategically placing units on a 5x5 grid.

name: Uncle Nook's Survivors
description: Uncle Nook's Survivors is an action rogue-like game. Survive an onslaught of monsters and become the ultimate monster killing machine by upgrading your character with unique weapons and abilities.

name: The Raindrop: A Vocal Odyssey
description: Become Poseidon's voice and harness the elemental power of ice, water, and vapor in this enchanting 2D platformer, drawing inspiration from the rich tapestry of Greek mythology. Your voice becomes the key to unlocking intricate puzzles in a visually striking world.

name: New Leaf Traveler and Youth's Memories
description: New Leaf Traveler and Youth's Memories "is a short story RPG that involves playing the role of a young owner of a forest tavern and trying to run your own business to repay your debts. Meeting various guests and understanding their stories...

name: Monkey Party
description: Merge balls, unleash adorable monkeys, and build a tower of fun in Monkey Party! Master precision placement for maximum monkey mischief. It's a charming puzzle adventure that's easy to play and hard to put down!

name: Marionetes
description:
Marionetes is a narrative-driven 3D platform adventure game about a discarded marionette.

Painful and sad performances of a brilliant marionette. Trown in the furnace by her creator the poor ballerina has to learn how to live without the strings.

name: Seen
description: Submission for Halloween game jam and created in only two weeks. You have been bitten by a vampire who puts you into a "saw-like" trial where you must prove worthy of the dark gift he has given you or be destroyed. This is a short game (10 minute maximum, your time is ticking) with two characters to select from, and two endings based on your choices.

name: A-Ressha de Ikou i
description: Released on the DoCoMo 504i/505i/506i/900 mobile phones as a service planning game and distributed by Hudson Soft. Players had to pay a monthly fee to access the game.

name: A-Ressha de Ikou: The 21st Century - Perfect Set
description: Sin descripción

name: A-Ressha de Ikou: The 21st Century - Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: A-Train Evolution Pack
description: This edition includes the PlayStation version of AIV: Evolution Global, a PlayStation Mouse, an A-Train mousepad, and a PlayStation memory card.

name: Five Nights at Treasure Island 2: Original Revamp
description: You're Greg, you've been working on Treasure Island for a good few months, until, one day, your boss signs you up for another position, you're going to work in Treasure Island's main power building which supplies power for the Island's attractions and lights, you're a night guard in there for 5 nights due to recent reports of suspicious activity. Your job is to find out what's happening there. Nothing will go wrong right? On an island of Disney Dreams.

name: Secret Kiss
description: Can you keep a secret?

name: A-Ressha de Ikou 3D Neo
description: Sin descripción

name: Birthday Boy and Benny
description: An emotional story-rich game with an emphasis on exploring the unknown, surviving abuse, dealing with inner demons and disabilities, making a ton of cakes, and dealing with the fact that not everything lasts forever.

name: AFK Chess
description: A PvP chess auto battler! Strategically build your army, use tactics to position your pieces and then watch them fight against your opponents! Can you assemble the strongest force?

name: A-Girl
description: "A-GIRL" is a unique game that combines anime-style, top-down shooting, and multiple adorable beast girls. Come and explore the fascinating game world with these cute beast girls.

name: Color Corruption
description: This first person shooter takes colors to the action while maintaining a mistery of what happened to all color islands. Can you unravel it's secrets?

name: Halloween Again
description: Step into a world teeming with anticipation, and join us for a hair-raising adventure.

name: House Master
description: Have you ever dreamed of what it would be like to build your own house? Or maybe just your own gazebo, shed, or outdoor fireplace? What would it look like, and how much could it cost? The House Master will answer all these questions and more!

name: Kingless Pawns
description: Kingless Pawns is a turn-based strategy Game with rogue-like elements. Personalize, Equip and Upgrade your Pawn in order to Defeat the Evil King.

name: Kittens with Cannons: Prelude
description: An action-RPG where you control a squad of gun-wielding cats! Complete quests, aid kitizens, and blast your way through the robot army!

name: Phosfi
description: Phosfi is an atmospheric, metroidvania style action-platformer. Explore and fight your way through a dark and dangerous coastal world full of mysteries and ancient treasures. Discover long buried temples and fend off Eldritch monstrosities in this beautiful 2D hand drawn and animated adventure.

name: Money Transporter
description: "Money Transporter" is an intense game that puts you in charge of transporting money safely from the bank to the ATM and back.

name: Midnight Run
description: Midnight Run is a game where you, the player, is on a mission to get late night snacks for your friend. However, just because it seems like a simple quest to fulfill, the city has a bunch of weird things that happens to you along the way.

name: Rogue Tactics
description: Rogue Tactics is a turn-based strategy game with RPG elements. Fight, learn new spells, recruit new creatures into your squad and improve them.

name: Voxlands
description: Explore gorgeous raytraced voxel lands, meet the local mutated wild-life, find out what went wrong, and quest, craft, loot, build, destroy and shoot your way to the top of the foodchain! Play alone, or with friends! Assuming you know how to share..

name: The Good Overlord
description: You're the guardian of the realm's most feared dungeon, now aiding heroes. 'The Good Overlord' is a Roguelike Bag-Builder with monsters, traps, and secrets. Defeat enemies, collect relics, and uncover the reason behind the Overlord's benevolence.

name: Solcialists
description: Solcialists is The Ultimate Operating System for the best Solcialists control experience. Mars 2066.

name: SkateNationXL
description: Get ready to dive into a realistic skateboarding adventure! Explore skateparks, urban landscapes, and iconic spots. User-friendly controls, advanced tricks, and a rewarding progression system for the ultimate skateboarding experience. Stay tuned for updates!

name: Toad Tales
description: "Toad tales" is a brutal mix of turn-based tactics and roguelike with RPG elements. You will encounter many different enemies, traps and dangers on your path to greatness. But being the greatest wouldn't make any sense without a challenge, would it?

name: The Hotel: Floor 13
description: You've just stepped out of an erratic elevator into the eerily silent reception of a hotel floor that shouldn't exist. The neon lights flicker, casting long, ominous shadows, and the décor screams 1980s – an atmosphere frozen in time, filled with an unsettling nostalgia.

name: Threshold of Awakening
description: In 1960s USA, Jane Ferguson, a New York restaurant owner, receives an information on her CIA agent husband Mark, who had vanished mysteriously during a Tibet mission. To uncover his hidden secrets, she follows his trail, delving into the enigma of his disappearance.

name: Spooky Town
description: Spooky Town is a top-down corner Roguelike spell building game that utilizes various spells to create unimaginable spell effects, with ultra high degrees of freedom even for developers.

name: Mystic Valley Battleground
description: Valley Battlefield is a casual adventure game where you explore various monsters or events to gain equipment and skills. By strategically upgrading equipment and matching skills, improving one's own attributes, defeating a powerful boss to achieve ultimate victory!

name: We Love Katamari Reroll + Royal Reverie - Katamari Damacy Series Music Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sims 4 Halloween Bundle
description: Transform your Sims and their homes for Halloween with The Sims 4 Werewolves Game Pack, The Sims 4 Vampires Game Pack, and The Sims 4 Spooky Stuff Pack.

name: Deep Space
description: Sin descripción

name: Video Poker
description: Sin descripción

name: BigChadGuys
description: BigChadGuys Plus Plus is a unique Cobblemon experience that blends the worlds of Minecraft and Pokemon. The mod pack offers a wide range of new content and features, including improved combat mechanics, revamped farming, new decoration blocks, and custom world generation with unique biomes, structures, and Pokemon. The mod pack also prioritizes performance improvements to ensure seamless gameplay. BigChadGuys Plus Plus is a must-try for players looking for a fresh and engaging experience.

name: Wander in Wonder
description:
This work is an interactive animation piece on the adventures of a lost little rabbit wandering through the woods.
As night draws near, wonder-working plants and flowers show the way.

name: Elite Soldier: Modern Gun Shooter and Tank Combat
description:
Action 3D modern shooter, or FPS (First Person Shooter), frenetic gun combat in the battlefield, crossfire, with varied arsenal of weapons and guns, next-gen 3D graphics (with the quality of consoles and PC games), frenetic action and insane gameplay: battle of tanks in realistics battlefields, attack helicopters, infiltration missions, hand and weapon/gun combat, and more!

Kerpen Studios proudly announces its first FPS shooter (first person shooter) in years: Black Operation. Black Operations (or black ops) are covert military operations. Your mission is to infiltrate in a foreign military intervention zone and to complete all objectives with the precision of a elite soldier. It's your mission, failure is not an option!

description: Sin descripción

description: A puzzle game - fill the board with the same number.

name: Empire
description: This turn-based game aims at short sessions and can be played up to 6 players on the same playdate!

name: Outside Parties
description: Outside Parties is a “hidden picture”/“hidden object”-style horror scavenger hunt, coming to Playdate.

name: Midnight Raider
description: A hack and slash metroidvania where you battle enemies in order to get to the next area.

name: Wi-fi Dungeon: Organism Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Art-O-Ween: A Ghost in the Gallery
description: Explore the art gallery like never before as you join Bop and Ghostie in the search for their missing dog over Halloween Night!

name: Akizora Memories: Horizon of Fate
description: 「あの頃に帰りたい─、たとえその先が暗闇だとしても─」『学園もの×SF』でお送りする青春SFビジュアルノベル。平凡な学園生活で、青春を謳歌する主人公とヒロイン。しかし、学園にはある病気と、世界を変えてしまうような秘密が潜んでおり……。

name: Elemental Wizards TCG
description: Elemental Wizards is a card strategy game where mages challenge each other in mystical duels to bring honor and glory to their clan. Each mage counts with a vast spell knowledge, henchmen, and allies who assist them in their fight to subject the enemy forces.

name: Fortnite: Skull Squad Pack
description: Rise from the crypt and creep on the unsuspecting with this bone chilling Skeleteam! Rattle your bones with the Skull Squad pack!

name: Zombie Infinity
description: Set your own personal record! Kill crowds of zombies! Blast them! Buy grenades for points ! Infinity

name: The Ump Show
description: The Ump Show is a baseball umpire simulator where you balance making accurate calls and enforcing your will on the game. Make accurate calls but cheat to make sure your favorite team wins!

name: Spooky Tower
description: You have been left alone. Your only tools are your trusty jetpack and your item spawner. But your spawner has malfunctioned and will only spawn random items! You must ascend the tower to fix your tool and defend your outpost from the approaching danger!

name: The Night Watch
description: The Night Watch is a retro-styled survival horror set in an abandoned shopping mall that shut down in the 1990s. Investigate overnight vandalism reports as a night watch security guard. Assemble a team in online co-op mode, or venture in and take on the job alone.

name: Master of Deception
description: As Cheryl approached the target of one of her scams, she accidentally discovered a great secret about this mysterious man, dragging her into a complicated situation from which she could not escape! In order to escape from this weird situation, Cheryl’s solution was…to have sex?!

name: Dragon Hop
description: A 3D precision platformer, where you control a tiny dragon, collect hidden treasures, fight enemies and try to reach the top, while exploring beautiful areas.

name: Day of Judgment
description: In Day of Judgement, a dark fantasy management roguelite, lead a guild of heroes, wield enchanted swords, craft elixirs, and safeguard villages from a demon invasion. Your tactical mastery in combat and resource allocation will shape the fate of the realm.

name: R Body Adventure
description: A 3d platformer in a futuristic world ! In this hexagonal tale, make your way around the globe to stop Mr.Body's plan ! Fight dozens of robots, gear up & save the planet toward a greater future !

name: Vagrant Strider
description: Vagrant Strider is an Arcade Action Adventure RPG Redefined. Cursed by a vanquished evil without a home to return to. The hero will journey to the ends of existence. In order to find a way to stop the curse that is slowly engulfing everything. A one of a kind retro experience...not to be missed!

name: Debt Deadline
description: We drag you onto David’s headspace: A disturbed Debt Collector hustling on the surreal Naked City. In this survival narrative psycho-thriller RPG, you use secrets to manipulate, craft alliances, and create murder schemes. Manage your sanity or your mind will turn against you.

name: Pigsaw: Human Abattoir
description: Escape the nightmarish human abattoir in this blood soaked first person shooter.

name: Ruin
description: Ruin is a free to play survival sci-fi sandbox MMORPG indie game where you try to survive on mankinds attempt to colonize a distant planet. Chances are stacked against you, but don't give up. You are most likely the last human alive. It is up to you and you alone to do what you must to stay alive.

name: Dashes & Squares
description: Squares? Ready. Dashes? Ready. Random level generation? Ready. Be prepared to this endless survival game where you need to dash into your enemies and upgrade yourself to survive.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Fortresses and Focke-Wulfs - Dieppe
description: IL-2 Sturmovik: Fortresses and Focke-Wulfs - Dieppe is a realistic and challenging combat flight simulation set over the embattled beach fortress of Dieppe, France in WWII. Fly and fight in Focke-Wulfs, Messerschmitts, Spitfires, Typhoons, P-51’s and B-17’s as the iconic Raid of 1942 unfolds below.

name: OcculThieves
description: OcculThieves is a local competitive game for 2 to 4 players where your opponents are invisible. Keep an eye on each other's screens, cheating is the key to victory! Compete on 21 different maps and 3 game modes. Never let them see your next move coming!

name: Submersible
description: Submersible is a 1st person, Singleplayer, Ocean explorative, Horror game.

name: Dungeon Adventure Gang
description: Dungeon Adventure Gang is a co-op top-down multiplayer roguelike where you and three other adventurers team up to explore this unmarked dungeon as far as possible. Explore, gear up, reunite, and push on.

name: Couch Kittens
description: yeah Its a couch cat game. Finally! a no luck party game that everyone can play.

name: The Voluntary Chipping
description: You have resieved an invitation from the "Greenhouse" corporation for free chipping. But you have a choice not to be enslaved! You have to fight back against cyber machines.

name: Xiao La: Fantasy Dream
description: Xiao La: Fantasy Dream is a lovely freehand wind Galaxy Castlevania game with a high degree of freedom, in this game, you can use a variety of strange game methods to complete the game! Come on, join the game!

name: Abyssal Survivors
description: Fight thousands of monsters in the abyss and survive your delve! Abyssal Survivors is an anime casual game with bullet hell and rogue-lite elements. Build your party of unique delvers with overpowered combination!

name: Along Came a Dragonfly
description: Strange creatures from another dimension have appeared all over the land. Explore dungeons, solve puzzles, and capture monsters to fight them back, and discover a mystery best left forgotten.

name: Baskerville
description: A sci-fi visual novel reimagining The Hound of the Baskervilles (1902). Follow Vornovians Sherr-Lok & Watt-Sun as they try to uncover the legend behind a old family curse.

name: Eva
description: Eva is a 3D Action-Adventure game set in a dark, retro-futuristic world, blending combat and exploration elements into a unique and immersive experience.

name: Argo
description: Argo is a unique roguelite action strategy game in a minimalist style. Use combos to use abilities, dodge enemy attacks and defeat the Void, Hell and Pestilence bosses. You don't have to do it alone either, because you can play the entire game in online co-op mode!

name: Inferius
description: Descend into the underworld of "INFERIUS," a first-person, card-based game inspired by The Divine Comedy. Solve puzzles, battle creatures, and reclaim your soul in an ever-draining health race. Unleash strategic card combat and descend through 9 haunting levels on a journey of redemption.

name: Spooky Dwellers 2: Collector's Edition
description: Save your parents' house from mischievous spooky dwellers in a thrilling Match 3 ghost-hunting journey. Unleash talismans, conquer puzzles, and restore harmony!

name: Greedy in the Dark
description: Greedy in the dark is a slow-paced platformer game with Metroidvania elements. You venture into the dark caves under the abandoned factory to loot stuff, obviously you didn't take any equipment for moving in the dark (it's pricy nowadays), you 100% sure there will be something useful on your path.

name: Project Mist
description: Join the Project Mist in this new open world survival horror. Explore an enigmatic Island. Fight against colossal monsters. Build and defend your base while crafting traps, siege weapons, upgrading your gear and Gravity Gun. Survive or perish while unraveling the secrets behind the giant wall!

name: Project Star
description: A fast paced looter shooter set in a scifi world. Purge, loot, upgrade and repeat.

name: PNG Mall
description: Trapped in a sprawling and abstract shopping mall realm, you must explore, run, and hide in order to escape. Use your stereoscope to hunt down CDs, raid cash registers to buy items from vending machines, and sprint to safe zones when danger is near!

name: Hello, This Is Bear
description: "Hello, This Is Bear" is a game where you control a little bear to solve sokoban style puzzles. Bear may be small, but is more than strong enough to push around a variety of heavy looking puzzle mechanics.

name: Esferibot
description: What happened on this automated space station? Take control of Esferibot, the last working robot on the base and try to find it out

name: October Nightmares
description: Explore a Montréal neighborhood in the 70s, investigate a supernatural phenomenon that inflicts nightmares on its residents, and delve into the depths of the world of dreams to save their lives. October Nightmares is a point & click cosmic horror game where exploration mixes with puzzle solving.

name: Pickleball One
description: Dive into America's fastest-growing sport while making new friends! Master Pickleball anytime, anywhere, whether as a single player or with up to 4 participants. Beyond just singles and doubles, this app includes in-depth fitness and training modules, that will elevate both your physical and virtual gameplay. Experience a mixed-reality setting for immersive wall drills, practice sessions, and workouts.

name: Ophelia's Chapter
description: A story-rich, psychological-horror adventure game. Play as an urban witch with psychic abilities and delve into the mysteries of a world inspired by the work of Neil Gaiman and Stephen King.

name: Terror Quake 2
description: Terror Quake 2 is a mod for Quake 2 heavily influenced by Action Quake 2 and building off of it with a heavier lean into realism, new weapons and items.

name: Auxworld
description: Auxworld is a platform where users can generate endless gaming adventures using AI prompts and must escape the dreamworld before it turns into a nightmare.

name: Whiskers
description: Whiskers is a point and click horror game. You are captured by the infamous Mr. Whiskers, a twisted lunatic. Your mission is to escape from his grasp. Find your way out by collecting items and interacting with other victims.

name: Nowhere
description: Alien Life Simulator

name: Potion Permit: Halloween Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Horny Dungeon
description: Horny Dungeon is an NSFW roguelite turn-based RPG. Lead a team of captivating heroines, conquer dungeons and loot all the precious relics. Yet, the real treasures lie in the relationships you build along the way. And of course, they go beyond platonic...

name: Shadows of Rogue: The Sorcerer's Curse
description: In this game, you'll face increasingly relentless hordes of enemies and formidable bosses, all while discovering an array of valuable items and surprises along the way. Prepare for a casual yet intensely challenging gaming experience, with a wide range of battle combinations at your disposal.

name: Brick Buddies
description: Duo-crane control in a goofy couch co-op challenge! It's a race against time and woolly obstacles. Grab a buddy, stack sky-high, rack up points, and beware of those sheep!

name: Camp Counsellor Collector
description: Camp Counsellor Collector is a unique and challenging 2D pixel graphics, single-player game where you play as The Collector, a strong but scary Individual that lives in a mansion. Your job is to hunt and capture Camp Counsellor's, cute and sexy women that you keep in your basement.

name: Crafting Combat
description: Crafting Combat is a medieval team-based strategy game where teams of players craft weapons to then fight for an objective.

name: Wicked Brawler
description: A hack and slash game set in a fantasy world where you take control of a fierce female protagonist to fight off waves of peasants and orcs. Break boxes and chairs over their heads. Make use of many weapons with unique move sets to leave a trail of blood and broken furniture.

name: Fight or Flight VR
description: Fight and fly across vast alien worlds in Fight or Flight, a VR-exclusive FPS where physics-based locomotion and high-powered weaponry meet. Utilize a jetpack for tactical combat or swift escape in this high-octane shooter. Every moment demands a decision - will you fight or will you flee?

name: Flow of War
description: A classic RTS game that features auto-micro workers and warriors, freeing you to focus on your base defense strategy with a variety of towers and walls. Craft an army with MOBA-like heroes and units to counter your enemies' strengths and secure victory on stunning procedurally generated maps.

name: Queen of Tactics
description: Queen of Tactics is hexagonal grid turn-based tactical RPG. Manage four elements and use objects to follow journey to find the prince!

name: Reflection Witch
description: "Reflection Witch" is a Roguelike game that offers a unique reinterpretation of the classic brick-breaking genre. By drawing lines to create reflection panels, players can control and enhance the magic ball. Join the witch on an adventurous journey to explore the world of spells!

name: Dubai Builder
description: Dubai Builder is a strategy game in which you build, develop and manage a city in the desert and are responsible for all aspects related to it and struggle with difficult climatic conditions.

name: RedLine
description: You craved a life free from trouble, with no gangs, no licks, and zero turmoil. But life had a different story in mind. To make things even worse, your last job, which meant to bankroll your retirement, took a turn for the worse...

name: Lens Gloss
description: Lens Gloss is a dark, mysterious puzzle game inside an animator’s mind. You use different films to enter 3 worlds: his joyful golden past, his sombre blue present and his cold dark future.

name: Trix: Witching World
description: Trix is a role-playing game in adventure mode made in Pixel Art. Explore and discover what happened in the village where Trix lives and complete the missions and quests to discover an engaging story.

name: Stellarune
description: You've been cast out, left to fend for yourself in the Soul Sanctum with nothing but your ambitions, fleeting memories of the past, and your crumbling spell-inscribed die. In this unknown world covered with blood-tainted stars, it's time to begin your journey and escape the Sanctum's shackles.

name: 4AM
description: Reclaim your life from the brink of death. Dive into a near-future dystopia where you will hide when you can, run when you have to and try to solve your way to safety in this "Inside" inspired adventure near-future dystopian

name: Princess Pomu and the 5 Moons
description: Paint without T is PAIN! Princess Pomu just lost her Kingdom and her family was captured, and now she's possessed by an evil spirit! Master the simple but satisfying combo system, get more abilities, pick up weapons, and explore the surreal world of Illeh in this cute metroidvania with a violent twist.

name: Black Sheep
description: You are the royal Shepherd ! Your mission is to bring the Black Sheep to the rival kingdom as a gift to stop the wat ! Go on an adventure to complete your quest but think wisely, the Black Sheep must arrive alive !

name: Seductive Big Sister
description: [Seductive Big Sister] is a 3D interactive game, in the game, you play a newly released college student, your cousin took you to his house to play, in the his house, you met the sexy cousin's wife. And your sister gradually shows her hunger and thirst and has an unforgettable encounter with you 。。。

name: Helen
description: You are Helen, a violinist content creator and office worker lost in monotonous life routines until you find a mysterious origami letter that embarks on a soul-searching journey of self-discovery. Respond to the letters, fold into origami, explore the town and find gratitude in small things in life.

name: Mana Quest
description: What can you do when you've been isekai'd by mistake and you're just a regular guy? You become an entrepreneur! Take over a shop and get rich while building up your harem of monster girls in this comfy +18 hentai RPG!

name: GX Sudoku
description: GX Sudoku is just a basic classic Sudoku game., fill in the boxes to complete the game

name: The End of Nowhere
description: A cold game set in a remote Alaskan town. Waking up in a freezing Alaskan town, you are forced to survive against creatures that you have never seen before. Balance your scarce resources against the threats that inhabit the town, and find a way to escape this frozen hell.

name: VegeMine
description: Under tier upon tier of dark stratas, there grows endless vegetables, dig them, merge them, then eat them! This is a rouge-lite strategy game in which you play as a rabbit digging for vegetables, increasing your power as you advance through layers until you reach the final treasure!

name: City Zombie Madness
description: City Zombie Madness is a tower defense game in a post-apocalypse military zombie setting.

name: Mo.co
description: mo.co is the brand new IP from Supercell, starting with limited North American Beta for Android in October 2023.

name: Mapleland
description: Mapleland is an RPG-style world content being serviced on the MapleStory Worlds platform. Reconstructed from the past MapleStory, Mapleland invites you to relive your memories!

name: Paltokes and the Sphinx
description: Delve into the mystical world of ancient Egypt with "Paltokes and the Sphinx," an enthralling puzzle game. Players must skillfully position descending pieces onto the board, aiming to construct complete horizontal lines. With each level, the pace quickens and the challenges grow, all set against a backdrop adorned with hieroglyphics and iconic Egyptian symbols. Harness your strategic prowess and navigate the puzzles to unveil the secrets guarded by the Sphinx.

name: Lost Budapest
description: Sin descripción

name: Meteor Blastor
description: An Asteroid type game. It was one of the first two games by the studio Flipline Studios, and it was released in October 17th 2006 on their website as a Flash Game.

name: Fitment
description: A fitness mobile game for microworkouts. Get motivated to exercise a few minutes a day with Fitment. Collect new moves, items and decorate your world.

name: TVhTk
description: TVhTk is a teaser game containing various logs related to Nightmare Before Disney 2016 and the 4.0 version of Five Nights at Treasure Island. It is similar to other teaser games such as TBmsTF or TGsEE.

name: Pokémon Gadir Deluxe
description: Pokémon Gadir Deluxe is a reimagining of the original Pokémon Gadir fan-made game. Embark on a new adventure in the Gadir Region, where you'll challenge gyms and ultimately face the Pokémon League.

name: KillJoy
description:
Do you remember what Pray 2 should be when it was just announced?
That's right - the game about the bounty hunter: clapping:
Actually a project about a mercenary who helps order protectors in putting things in order, cleaning out the criminal rot from the most provincial corners of Dirty City.

name: Board Games
description: Presenting the "Timeless Board Game Bundle" - a delightful compilation of three iconic and universally cherished board games that have stood the test of time.

name: Serpens: Eternal Thievery
description: Serpens: Eternal Thievery is an immersive first-person stealth game where you embody Anika, a thief gifted with the power to loop back in time. With this unique ability and your arsenal of weapons, you must explore treacherous places, fight challenging enemies, and keep to the shadows.

name: Boki: The Summit
description: Boki is a Metroidvania, Choose your own adventure, Precision platformer in which you play as a young mountain goat, who must climb a mountain in seek of revenge. Dodge, battle and fluidly maneuver through several uniquely crafted areas and biomes and uncover the secrets of a tyrannical kingdom.

name: Watch
description: Sin descripción

name: Running Crazy
description: I have been waiting for you for a long time. The beauties are waiting for you at the finish line. Run!

name: Footy Bash
description: Step into the world of Footy Bash, Experience the rush of fast-paced football with 1-4 players. Unleash spectacular speckys to leave your opponents in awe and land devastating hits to thrill your fans. With dynamic gameplay and a classic look, Footy Bash is an electrifying footy spectacle.

name: The Clown's Forest 3: Haunting Apparitions
description: On a cold snowy night on December 17th 2011... David discovered his son missing and vowed to look for him around Hartown Park. But his desperate search ends in misery.

name: Powerful Dabl
description: Powerful Dabl is an action roguelike, find yourself in a snowy location, go through corridors filled with enemies, and only by destroying all the monsters can you move forward!

name: Night Fear
description: Night Fear is a fast-paced roguelike where you play as a brave knight, the last of a line of liberators. Use the best weapons and skills to defeat enemy units and not die in a dark dungeon. You must give it your all, collect the best weapons, complete all levels of the dungeon and stay alive!

name: Vlad Voievod Dracula: Episode 2
description: A challenging Classicvania game with an instant death - infinite respawn mechanic (and an "easy" mode). It's tactical: you need to understand each challenge, and time your moves for perfect execution. Easy to learn but hard to master. It's about Vlad the Impaler, the real medieval Dracula.

name: DaemonClaw: Origins of Nnar
description: Defend humanity from a surprise attack by the mystical creatures of the world of Nnar in this high speed arcade/console style action game coming to modern and classic retro platforms.

name: Woodside
description: Welcome to Woodside, a third-person survival horror adventure. Explore, investigate and survive as Grace as she comes face to face with the supernatural terrors that plague a seemingly quaint British village.

name: Mad Sage
description: Mad Sage is a 2D action roguelike where you play as a bizarre sorcerer, go to the magical forest and calm the monsters. The forest is full of different types of monsters, for each enemy you need to find your own approach.

name: Girls And Robots 2
description: This game is an early Roguelike game. The world is lost to monsters and bugs. Players need to get out of the base through fighting, find the truth behind the monster attack, and save this "broken" world if possible.

name: Regular Spacecraft: Defending the Mothership
description: Defeat the enemies. Upgrade the spacecraft. Defend the mothership. Regular Spacecraft - Defending the Mothership is a shoot em'up game with roguelite elements.

name: The Tainted Land
description: 'The Tainted Lands' is a classic 2D turn-based RPG about an epic adventure in world of dark and eldritch horrors. As the last of an ancient order of Guardians, you must gather allies, explore the wilderness where the secrets of the past dark ages lie dormant, and slay the unspeakable horrors.

name: Furious Rage
description: Furious Rage is a linear 2D platformer about an unusual hero who finds himself in a strange place. Guide your character through dark locations and don’t let the monsters destroy you! All locations have doors that block your path and levers from them and enemies that will try to interfere.

name: Security Guy
description: Set up security measures to catch dastardly thieves red-handed. Investigate a variety of exciting, colorful locations and adapt your tools to their environments to persecute burglars with maximum efficiency.

name: I's Long Night
description: A relaxed casual adventure game

name: Blood & Chaos
description: Blood & Chaos is a roguelike tribute to the golden era of '80s RPG gaming. Create a fellowship of 6 heroes and embark on an epic journey. Explore a thriving world with quests to accomplish, cities to discover and dungeons to explore where your mastering of turn-based combats will keep you alive.

name: FeatherCall
description: FeatherCall is a fast pace, puzzle platformer where you help Luna, a mother blue bird, rescue her lost children. Brave numerous challenges and puzzles by Dashing to new heights, Throwing a guiding feather, and Gliding back to safety!

name: Civil War Strategy
description: A one or two player strategic level war game simulating the American Civil War. Play as either the Union or Confederacy - recruit/drill armies, fortify cities, choose commanders, send troops into battle, build navies, raid enemy commerce, and more.

name: This Halloween ? We're Exploring the Haunted Brothel
description: Join dominant Tigerman Jasper and his submissive boyfriend Varahn in their Halloween plans to uncover the secrets of the mysterious haunted brothel! What strange fantasies will be uncovered in this kinky cathouse? Whatever comes it's sure to be a spooky, saucy and romantic night~

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 5
description: Sin descripción

name: "Edna & Harvey" Bundle
description: Two legendary adventure games in one quirky bundle!

name: Kye
description: A classic action-puzzle game: now in black and white.

name: ​Gooseball Playdate: Plus Slingshot / Spars
description: Sin descripción

name: Made in Wired
description: High-tempo microgame shooting.

name: CryptoMania: Movie Quotes
description: Can you unscramble over 200 movie quotes?

name: Dream Slayer
description: first-person arcade action set in your subconscious

name: Flinger
description: An arcade game for Playdate!

name: Couples
description: A memory game

name: Crossword
description: Across Lite Puzzle Player for Playdate

name: Rocky & Co
description: A brand new adventure featuring Rocky Memphis from ICON64!

name: You're Gonna Miss the Bus!
description: Henry is running late for school. Again.

name: Munlay Online
description: Action RPG built by gamers.

name: Bohnice: Within the Mind
description: Explore the dark secrets of a closed psychiatric hospital in Prague, Bohnice, as a determined journalist. Uncover chilling experiments, gruesome tortures, and paranormal encounters. Collect clues and photographs to reveal the horrifying truth hidden for 40 years.

name: Age of Zalmoxis: Rise of the Fallen
description: "Age of Zalmoxis" brings to life a captivating blend of history, fantasy, and state-of-the-art gaming, developed in association with the Institute of Archaeology Iasi of the Romanian Academy. Set in the diverse landscapes of ancient Dacia, the game begins as a Battle Royale.

name: Alien Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Aetherift
description: A difficult co-op dungeon running roguelike for 2-10 players. Gear up and defeat challenging bosses with action combat and team based tactics. Build your character however you like, from nimble tanks to heavy mages.

name: Abyss Manager Idle
description: Abyss Manager Idle is an incremental tower defence game. Fend off assaults from two worlds, recruit and develop your personnel in an endless cycle of time. Defeat the calamity emerging from the abyss at the year's end to break the endless gyre.

name: Bad Boy's Bad Day
description: 3D beat 'em up featuring stylized graphics, an extensive movelist, and free flowing combos.

name: Alyssa
description: Alyssa is a game in which you play the role of a girl from a broken family. One day she hears voices and decides to kill everyone who stands in the way of her happiness...

name: Darkness and Fear: Eerie Shadows
description: "Darkness and Fear: Eerie Shadows" is an exciting horror game that will make you nervous. The game takes place in a deserted city shrouded in darkness, and immerses you in a nightmarish world filled with creepy shadows and evil spirits.

name: Death Rabbit
description: The city that never sleeps has taken a sinister turn, and the dark tunnels of the MTA have become the epicenter of a horrifying outbreak. As Alisa, you must navigate through a labyrinthine underground world fraught with danger, where unspeakable horrors lurk around every corner.

name: Dead Meat
description: Lucia's just killed her husband... probably. Can you get a confession before her lawyers arrive? Use your own words to manipulate, persuade, threaten, or even seduce her into 'fessing up. This billionaire has a terrible secret. And time is running out.

name: Carvival
description: Carvival is a top-down roguelite vehicle combat game. Mission is to destroy enemy vehicles, gather resources, and upgrade your car. Wreck bigger vehicles as you progress. Gain in-game perks. Create powerful combos with auto-trigger weapons. The mantra? Drive, shoot, drift, repeat, and power up!

name: Chessium: 3D Chess Battle
description: Chessium offers 3D Chess experience where people can play chess and feel themselves in the middle of war!

name: Children of the Forest
description: Iki and Tika live deep within a mysterious forest. Follow their enchanting journey as they find themselves amidst an imminent new threat. Children of the Forest is a story-driven adventure game about two siblings venturing through a land filled with extraordinary remnants from an ancient past.

name: Evolution Survival
description: Evolution Survival is a survival game where the universe evolves around you. The plants and animals you saw at the beginning will be different at the end, They may not even be there, the star may have gone supernova or shrunk into a white dwarf. Who knows when Natural Selection is at the wheel!

name: Epic Monster Quest
description: Join the quest, conquer themed stages, and battle epic monsters! Test your skills in the ever-changing world of Epic Monster Quest - a roguelite adventure like no other!

name: Elowyn and the Stolen Souls
description: Enter the magic world of Elowyn! Evolve with her and discover all the secrets to magic in this metroidvania with incredible characters and scenary. Learn powerful spells, create potions, unravel many riddles and live the entire fantasy!

name: Insanity
description: A young adult enters a mental state trying to overcome his past traumas and relationships.

name: Gold Grabbing Goblin
description: Master the art of goblinry! Seize all gold, elude enemies, and emerge triumphant in this epic quest! Can you be the ultimate goblin champion?

name: Heartless Corporation
description: Embark on an enthralling journey into the corporate world with "Heartless Corporation," a visual novel dating sim. Immerse yourself in a gripping narrative filled with drama, romance, and ethical dilemmas as you guide Liam through the twists and turns of corporate life.

name: Hell Scream
description: Hell Scream is a fast-paced FPS with rogue-lite elements set in a transforming Colosseum of Hell. You have multiple sinners each from a different timeline and unique abilities. Wield firearms and harness ancient supernatural as you strive for redemption against relentless demon hordes.

name: Hyper Tanks
description: Choose your Tank and shoot your way through futuristic Arenas! Destroy hordes of enemies in an epic Single Player Campaign or beat up your friends and AI players in action packed Multiplayer modes! Use Powerups, Special Weapons and Tank Abilities to survive the mayhem of Hyper Tanks!

name: Little Shrimp: Legend Reborn
description: Little Shrimp：Legend Reborn is a captivating Wuxia idle RPG that offers an open-world concept and an engaging storyline. With its free exploration of the Jianghu, leisurely gameplay, and auto-leveling fun, you'll have a blast with high levels of character involvement.

name: Party Crashers Mayhem
description: Introducing Party Maniacs Rules: Get ready for a wild adventure where a bunch of crazy party animals break all the rules of normal parties. As the party spirit meets a mix of different bashes, brace yourself for a hilarious plan that takes nightlife to the next level.

name: Rogue Ottoman
description: Rogue Ottoman is a steampunk-Ottoman themed action rogue-lite game where you play a female protagonist to save the dynasty from collapsing. You'll explore a sprawling battlefield through Istanbul. Use your swords and attack with your special ability. No checkpoints. Die, upgrade and repeat!

name: Ratking
description: Become The Salary Man. Unleash ZA BLADE. Save Your Boss. Experience a life OFF ZA CLOCK. a Uniquely Surreal Action Combat, Player Choice Fueled, Point & Click Adventure.

name: Pulsars & Crowbars
description: Pulsars and Crowbars is a rogue-like deck builder that combines grid-based tactical gameplay with character-driven storytelling. Unlock cards, craft your deck and save the galaxy!

name: Princess Parent
description: Princess Parent is a love letter to classic life simulation games. Enjoy a new parenting simulation where you schedule her time and make her choices until she's 18. Will she become a housewife or a dragon princess?

name: Price of Flight
description: Fight, flight, and steal to survive in PRICE OF FLIGHT, the bird-based bloodsport of the future. Aid the failing Avian Resistance, save yourself, or die on live TV in this board game-inspired RPG.

name: Scorching Engines
description: Drive a giant experimental vehicle in a frozen post-apocalyptic wasteland. Collect resources to fuel the vehicle, and build turrets to help protect it and yourself from raiders. Deliver the vehicle's heatcore to humanity's colony to save them from the permanent winter

name: Service of Love
description: 【Service of Love】is an interactive 3D game in which you can choose one of two heroines to interact with. The game is set in a love hotel, enjoy the intimate interaction with the two heroines in the love hotel.

name: Settlands
description: A 2D top-down adventure game with procedurally generated worlds. Gather resources, build, craft and explore with up to 3 more friends.

name: Total Gravity
description: Navigate cosmic chaos, altering bullet trajectories in epic space battles. Forge alliances, uncover secrets, and fight back to save your besieged home planet.

name: Temple of the Green Moon
description: Temple of the Green Moon is a psychological thriller that will send you into the heart of a mystical journey full of mysteries and incredible discoveries.

name: The Rubro Rose's Castle
description: For centuries, an ancient family has ruled the lands of the morbid and decadent province of Rubro Rose, but with the sudden illness of the lord of Vorkrom Castle, everything falls upon the young princess of pale skin...

name: The Semen Donation Truck!
description: Two succubus invite you to donate your semen using the condoms they provide. If you beat their record in the Whack-O-Mole minigame, they also gladly provide physical help in your endeavor at donating.

name: Steel Circuit
description: In "Steel Circuit" You control a resilient robot on a mission to overthrow a malevolent rogue AI. Craft potent weaponry, battle enemy robots, and explore the facility to reclaim it for unseen benefactors. Beware, death comes at a high price!

name: Wasted: Will Be Brutal
description: A Survival Open World PVE/PVP

name: Venator
description: Dive into a retro Action RPG odyssey set in ancient Rome. As Titus, hunt spectral evils in a quest for revenge. Sail the haunted Mediterranean, face mythical monsters, and unravel mysteries from beyond the veil. A storm of vengeance brews; Rome's shadows beckon you forth.

name: Zero Vortex
description: Get lost in the mind-bending world of Zero Vortex, a retro 6DOF shooter. Navigate disorienting levels, upgrade weapons, and face off against diverse enemies. Immerse yourself in mixed modern-retro graphics and an all-new soundtrack. Prepare for chaos!

name: GorillaCraft
description: This is a 3d action game. Find your enemies in difficult mazes, duel with shocking bosses, decapitate them in a flash of swords, and earn your honor! I came, I saw, I conquered! Chief, it’s time to pick up your sword and start your journey!

name: Toraware Hotel
description: A world where humans and beastmen coexist. A secluded hotel exclusively for beastmen deep in the mountains. An incident occurs on a night when everyone has gone to sleep... Whether you can safely return from the hotel depends on your choices.

name: Ayakashi Princess: Prequel
description: The fox princess's great adventure! A story from a little while ago. Tamamo Hime wakes up in the Ayakashi world, ``Kakuriyo.'' She makes her way home, feeling a bit uncomfortable. Explore various stages and move forward with graceful actions! Is this world a dream or...

description: Sin descripción
