name: Homeward
description:
It is time to start the journey back home. Pack your bag carefully and set out to face whatever adventures await along the way.

Homeward is a short text-based adventure game, where you have to manage a small inventory. What will you throw away and what will you keep for later?

This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 54. The theme was 'limited space'.

name: Frost & Flame: King of Avalon
description: Sin descripción

name: Roll me Home
description: Roll the character with the rudder and jump. As usual, it's a space bar It has simple manipulation, but it's not going to be an easy challenge Understand the physics of things and explore the silhouette.

name: LazyTown
description: In 2009, a game based on the TV show LazyTown was in development by Redoubt for the Nintendo Wii and DS. No details about the project were ever publicly revealed and the game was silently cancelled.

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage: Fire Demon Pack
description: Summon devilish monsters from the underworld by using your burning weapons to rip the souls from your opponents' chests. This pack contains an outfit, a sword, a dagger, a mount skin, an eagle skin, and an outfit dye.

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage: Deluxe Pack
description: The Deluxe Pack includes a Prince of Persia-inspired outfit, eagle and mount skins, weapons, and more! Dress yourself as a prince and play with the Sands of Time to turn the world of Baghdad into a wondrous tale in which the flow of time can be manipulated.

name: BeetleQuest 2023
description: BeetleQuest is an adventure game about three beetlefriends who go on a great adventure together. Visit sunny forests, mysterious swamps, dark caves, and even a land underwater! All beautifully hand-drawn and animated, and filled with point and click goodness!

name: Chain Crisis
description: Chain Crisis: An immersive cyberpunk MMORPG set in a futuristic world. Experience thrilling battles, powerful abilities, and an engaging storyline. Uncover the secrets of a dystopian society and forge your destiny. Join the revolution on Solana! #MMORPG #Cyberpunk

name: Ride 5: Far East Pack
description: Add 2 Japanese race winners to your garage with RIDE 5 - Far East Pack.

name: Ride 5: Free Pack 01
description: Put your skills to the test with the RIDE 5 - Free Pack 01 to get two lightning-fast naked bikes that combine power and excellent handling!

name: Overpass 2: Ford Play Rock Bouncer
description: The Ford Play Rock Bouncer is an 800 hp monster that can climb the steepest slopes. Its high-performance suspension and oversized tyres make it your best friend when it comes to taking on the most difficult challenges.

name: Overpass 2: Polaris Vehicles Pack
description: Take the wheel of two iconic Polaris vehicles in two categories: the RZR XP 1000 High Lifter (UTV) and the Scrambler 850 (ATV).

name: Overpass 2: Career Starter Pack
description: The Career Starter Pack gives you access to more effective teammates. Gain the services of an experienced mechanic, researcher, meteorologist and geomorphologist to help you make faster progress.

name: SpectralClimb
description: 3D Platformer with some basic combat!

name: Ape Reunion
description: An open world MMO RPG pixel art game using NFTs as characters.

name: GTRevival
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Scope 15
description: A sequel for Super Scope 6 was being developed around 1993/1994, but was never announced. It became public when found in the 2020 Nintendo Gigaleak.

name: GoblinAmerica
description:
GoblinAmerica is a fast-moded gun-style game set in a low-level gunkjuiced America.

As a solar goblin, you will possess myriad past, present, and future presidents at the worst moments in their lives, then set things right with a collection of startling guns, hats, beliefs, shoes, and creams. Will you safeguard the divinely-ordered existence of the Yellow Sun? Or will you allow the Verminstar’s disordered swamp to chew this world back into formlessness?

name: Pokémon Unbreakable Ties
description: In the vibrant Akebia region, your childhood dream of becoming a Pokémon Master is reignited. But this isn't your typical journey. Uncover the secrets of the Royal Family's grip on the region, unravel Professor Alama's mysterious past, and protect the legendary Eon Pokémon from their grasp. With stunning visuals, engaging characters, and a gripping story, Pokémon Unbreakable Ties offers a fresh take on the classic Pokémon experience. Explore the region, challenge Gym Leaders, and forge unbreakable bonds with your team as you unravel a conspiracy that threatens to shatter the peace.

name: High Energy Heroes
description: High Energy Heroes(高能英雄) is an exciting new 3D first-person(TBR)/ Third person hero-based Mobile. shooter game developed by Tencent Photon Studio. Similar to its direct adaptation Apex Legends, the game is set in a futuristic sci-fi world and offers players a wide range of hero characters, each with their unique abilities and personality traits. Players can choose their favorite hero characters and compete with other players in various gameplay modes.

name: Oriental Blue
description: Oriental Blue is a cancelled RPG in the Far East of Eden (Tengai Makyō) series that was in development by Hudson and Red Entertainment for Nintendo 64DD in late ‘90. A few years later, in an interview published on the japanese Nintendo website, Kaori Shirozu (director and designer at Hudson at the time) explained that the project was resurrected and re-developed as a GBA game and finally released in 2003 as Oriental Blue: Ao no Tengai.

name: Sporestory
description: Help reunite a town of lost spores.

name: Afterdream & Distraint Series Bundle
description: This bundle comes with 3 games and the soundtrack for Distraint 2!

name: Metal Slug Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: The King of Fighters Bundle
description: The King of Fighters Bundle comes with 6 games plus Upgrade pack 1 and 2 for The King of Fighters XIV: Galaxy Edition!

name: Eros Lights: Strip-Club
description: Welcome to the world of intrigue and incredible adventures in Eros Lights: Strip-Club, a visual novel for adults that takes you to a mysterious and magical club where the true faces of mystery are revealed.

name: Dungeon Girl
description: A challenging 2D side-scroller RPG game where you have only one life and death is permanent. Survive 40 interchangeable levels with your wits and consumables to get the Amulet of Yendor and escape the Dungeon with it.

name: CryptaSync Cyber: Urban Depths
description: Embark on a cyberpunk odyssey in ever-shifting catacombs, where shadows conceal dreadful adversaries. Arm yourself with cutting-edge cyberpunk guns, facing array of stalkers. No run is alike; adapt or face consequences. Immerse in a world of shadows and neon - you're Cyberpunk, but your world isn't!

name: Dust Front RTS
description: Dust Front is a classic RTS with grand strategy elements and a non-linear campaign. Lead strategic maneuvers, overwhelm your enemies with cannon fodder, or stomp them into the stone age with carpet bombing on the lifeless fields of Dust Front.

name: Extreme Riding
description: Extreme Riding is an racing game where your task is to test your skills in driving different cars on exciting tracks. Choose your car and go to the track! Go through unusual obstacles, jump over cliffs, maneuver, and get to the finish line in a certain time.

name: Do Not Smile
description: The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Each game level is filled with various traps and quest items. You need to move around the level, bypassing the traps and completing the task. Carefully think over each of your actions, because the charges to change gravity are not infinite.

name: Dos-Plan
description: The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements where you play as a a professional agent whose goal is to sneak into the most protected corners of the map and go unnoticed. The zone is very well guarded and in order to reach the desired target, you will have to be very careful.

name: Enter The Night
description: Enter The Night is a rogue-lite hybrid of two addictive genres: survival and survivors. Collect, harvest & craft during the day. Defeat hordes of enemies at night. Equip yourself with the right gear and absurd weapons. Cook and eat delicious food to get stronger. How many days can you survive?

name: Ezerath Plus
description: Expansion of Ezerath's Last Hope adding new regions, dungeons, monsters, and access to new items.

name: DisOrder in the Court
description: DisOrder in the Court is a 3-8 player party game where players must talk themselves out of comically embarrassing or ridiculous scenarios. Play as convicts competing for a presidential pardon as your questionable past is brought to light.

name: Crime: 1997
description: Newport, 1997: Waterside gang member, Henry Gallagher, is thrust into danger following a failed deal, tangling with the police and the Sorvino Mafia. A riveting drug sweeps the city, igniting hidden conflicts.

name: Doors24
description: Protect your computer from an incoming swarm of viruses. Build and upgrade towers made from everyday life objects. Develop your own powerups to strengthen yourself!

name: Fallen Down
description: Fallen Down is a strategy tactics card game and visual novel. Save all of reality. Face the gods and their creations. There will be lots of heroism, laughter, and tears along the way.

name: Ashes of the Past
description: In the devastated ocean city you find yourself as Werner, searching for his wife, resisting looters, hunger and thirst... Explore, solve and survive in this city...

name: Breakthrough: Kemet X
description: Young warrior prince Jaraqo embarks on a warpath to become the pharaoh of a newly discovered galaxy the Kemetians have colonised and named Kemet X. However, he encounters formidable opposition from galactic overlords who resist his rule over the galaxy.

name: Elodya
description: Explore, craft, fight! Uncover the mysteries of the continent of Elodya by meeting interesting characters, completing quests, upgrading your gear and defeating tough bosses!

name: Copper Corrosion
description: Copper Corrosion is a turn-based strategic RPG game inspired by Cthulhu mythology and set in a Victorian-era steampunk world infused with H.P. Lovecraft-inspired stories and a unique combat system.

name: Expiri: Tenebris
description: A ship, an archeget. And the darkness!

name: Arcane Survival
description: Craft, build, survive, and defend against menacing monsters in this 2D survival sandbox game, Arcane Survival. Research, fortify and expand your base/combat capabilities using resources found in the world! Protect this flame that keeps you alive, feed the essence of your enemies and grow stronger!

name: Enmazened
description: Enmazened is a navigational exploration adventure through a minotaur filled, trap ridden maze ripe with treasure and adventure around every corner... and there are lots of corners! Will you be the first to reach the center and have your deepest wish granted?

name: Daisy's Diary
description: Daisy's Diary is an adorable post-apocalyptic survival game that utilizes farming and community management as well as engaging real-time combat and strategy. Create and grow your own safe haven, battle hordes of zombies, and discover that the undead might NOT be the biggest threat after all!

name: Capybarista
description: Build and manage your own cozy coffee shop in this relaxing, customizable, multiplayer game. Serve unique drinks, complete daily tasks, and collaborate with friends to make your shop thrive. Get ready to sip, socialize, and unwind!

name: Dream Cafe
description: Step into a dreamy world of macarons and cafe management! Craft colorful delights, satisfy whimsical customers, and become the Macaron Maestro in Dream Cafe. Ready to run your dream factory?

name: Deer Hunt
description: Set out on a hunt to capture the best deer! Strategically move your units while being careful not to spook it. Play hundreds of hand crafted levels designed to challenge and engage you intellectually set in a beautiful relaxing medieval world.

name: Goblin Quest
description: Goblin Quest is an immersive fantasy sandbox with a nonlinear storyline. From playing the hero who saves the lands to the villain who destroys it, the world will adapt and respond to your actions. You decide your fate.

name: Gate of Torment
description: Gate of Torment is a top-down 2D hardcore dungeon crawler extraction shooter, where you are seeking a way to escape Hell. Armed with guns and black magic, you raid dark and dangerous dungeons by using a mysterious portal device.

name: FutaMarket
description: The FutaGang have taken the control of the Underground and it's Black Market. They gave you a store and you need to work for them now. What happened? Collect datas, pictures, videos and discover the truth using your hacking skills & sex appeal.

name: Hacker's Life
description: Hacker's Life is a game where you take the seat of a hacker, infect devices all over the world with malware, and join a hacker group to pull off bigger attacks. See your malware take control of the world and become famous for your hacking skills, but be careful not to get busted.

name: Hashrine
description: Alphabet, Numbers and Symbols.

name: Goblin Siege: Protect the Castle!
description: Goblin Siege: Protect the Castle! is a tower-defense game where you will have to defend your castle from a siege of goblins. Recruit soldiers, plan your strategy, and have fun!

name: Hentai Swapy Puzzle
description: Hentai Swapy Puzzle is a puzzle game. It is relaxing, fun and not hard. Game has soft musics on background to enhance the relaxation.

name: Hentai HotLady
description: This is another story of Kozue Nada, a popular character in 'Hot Fit!' It contains many intense, sexy, and abnormal scenes with the main character of the original story.

name: Hexrite
description: You are a sorcerer part of a group of mysterious characters embarking on an adventure to fulfil an ancient magical ritual. Fight, quest and explore in this stylized action-adventure indie title!

name: Jery Mice vs Cats: Home Invasion
description: The eternal battle between Mice and Cats. You're a cute Mouse, so try to survive and avoid getting caught in a house full of Cats. Enjoy funny gameplay with numerous tricky situations. Clean the house of all these annoying animals!

name: Lighthoof
description: Leap, slash, dash, and ricochet your way through a ruined land in this hand-drawn 2D action-exploration game. Wield your light arrow against vicious foes and unlock new abilities to further explore the mountain of Essa. Along the way, you'll uncover the truth and choose the destiny of Lighthoof Noa.

name: Macabre Stage Vol. 1: Cursed Cartridge
description: This puzzle game looks normal, but it has something disturbing, a macabre mystery awaits you in this cartridge.

name: Magic Bean
description: This is the ultimate test of skill and determination: Magic Bean , an intense platformer. So, are you up for the challenge ?

name: Laila
description: Experience duality in 'Liala's Dreamtide': cultivate by day, decipher eerie alien dreams by night. Unveil the link between her idyllic farm life and nightmarish invaders. A fusion of farming and chilling puzzles in one captivating indie game.

name: Mr. Nomad
description: Mr. Nomad is a survival base-building, tower defense game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Set a fortified base around your camper, craft, endure brutal zombie raids, hide what is precious to you in underground bunker and embark on dangerous missions in search of resources.

name: Murayaki Villain
description: The very domination! Be the demon king who conquers the world! "Murayaki Villain"a village-burning, female-oriented, ♀ > ♂ Demon King Army training SLG

name: Design & Conjure
description: Join Dalia, a young witch, in her cozy adventure to fix her hometown. Reconnect with nature and bring beauty back as you clean, decorate, solve light puzzles, and help magical creatures affected by the mysterious corruption.

name: Mercury
description: A programmer named Lucy, aka Mercury, has just been hired at Nexus to work on new security systems for the company. However, as she has barely started her new job, she already discovers a major flaw giving her access to the multinational's secrets…

name: My Daily Pets
description: "My Daily Pets" is a game where you care for alien pets and uncover their secrets. Feed them, play, train, and dance. Investigate their origins, document findings, and bond with these adorable extraterrestrial companions!

name: Nature's Element
description: Defend Mother Nature's Realm! Become the "Element" and unlock the power of Air, Water, Earth, and Fire as you punch, pull, push, block, and redirect elemental chaos to stop your enemies from destroying the Natural realm!

name: Necro King
description: Necro King is a turn-based tactics roguelite in pixel art style. You play as a Master of Necromancy. Build your sculls deck, rise skeletons and other scum to defeat settlements desecrated by life...

name: Neo Testament
description: After our battle with AI, life as we knew it ended thousands of years ago. 5000 years have passed. I awoke from my sleep. My robotic body and "soul," I, "Marcus," set out to find the last organic matter for the future of humanity in a world controlled by AI. Follow my quest for salvation.

name: New Roanoke
description: "New Roanoke" delivers an immersive narrative experience, blending elements of horror, suspense, and psychological thriller. Immerse yourself in a meticulously crafted sci-fi world, brought to life by stunning visuals, atmospheric soundscapes, and chillingly realistic character performances.

name: Mystic Land: The search for Maphaldo
description: An old-school RPG game inspired by Wizardry 7, Might and Magic and Eye of the Beholder series. 2d grid-based movement, strategic turn-based combat and lots of places to visit and puzzles to solve.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Cthulhu Mythos 3
description: Do you hear that call? It's Cthulhu inviting you to play a new solitaire game!

name: Over Many Waters
description: Over Many Waters is an exciting Mesoamerican adventure of seafaring and exploration. Play as young Leo, a lost-at-sea Spanish explorer of Spanish and Aztec descent. Adventure the isles of the Azurian Sea, a series of ancient islands and waterways under threat of curse, war, piracy, and invasion.

name: Order of the Elements
description: Order of the Elements is an oldschool, skilling-based, indie MMORPG powered by Unreal Engine. It is a passionate enthusiasts attempt to return to the basics of what makes a MMO fun; challenging gameplay and meaningful progression without loot boxes, micro transactions or pay 2 win.

name: Paramedics!
description: Experience emergency medicine in Paramedics, an early-stage game. Play as an EMT, paramedic, or doctor, face realistic medical challenges, and team up in multiplayer mode. Perfect for medical enthusiasts and gamers alike. Join us in our evolving journey!

name: PSY in Apocalypse
description: Sin descripción

name: Project S.A.M
description: Evolve and build your own S.A.M to explore the underground and keep humans alive!

name: Polybius Invaders 2
description: Earth's fate hangs in the balance in this breathtaking retro inspired, Super Scaler Arcade Shoot-Em-Up.

name: Poly Kingdom: Siege
description: "Poly Kingdom: Siege" is a dynamic RTS taking you from a Native tribe to Roman Empire to Medieval kingdom! Engage in intense battles with siege weapons, traverse dangerous terrains, witness your empire evolve, and enjoy thrilling building destruction in this unique strategy game!

name: Rage Gang
description: RAGE GANG is an engaging multiplayer co-op PvP game about the hard life of the Robbers and Policemen. Choose your side, team up with friends, and steal something or fight the Gangs!

name: Red Echo
description: In this Sci-Fi SinglePlayer RPG set on Mars in the near future workers aren’t born, they are made. Precious is the Perfect Worker. Hidden in her DNA is a secret the Corporations will not let go. Join Precious as the groundswell of rebels fight back against greedy corporations. Help set Mars' fate.

name: R:\Block
description: R:\Block is a puzzle game where you push and fuse blocks to solve increasingly difficult levels. It is also a puzzle platformer, that will force you to not only work your brain, but your jumping skills. Within the mysterious and atmospheric space a story unfolds.

name: Red Machina Teaser: ThoughtJudger
description: A narrative experience that tests the limits of your ethics and morals.

name: Re.wired
description: A story of loneliness in a connected world set in 90s Japan. Control high schooler Kazami through a psychological explorative visual novel horror to uncover the truth of garbled messages and student disappearances. Featuring 2D hand drawn anime sprites in an explorable 3D techno-horror world.

name: Saadex: Perpetual Storm
description: Saadex is a fast-paced sci-fi tower defense with RTS elements! Build, move and upgrade towers to fend off waves of relentless enemies. Utilize tactical skills to reshape the flow of battle in your favor. Challenge yourself to achieve ever higher scores and secure your place on the leaderboards.

name: Run Gor
description: Dreams, synonymous with suffering and regrets. You are not sure what happened. Solve the mystery that surrounds you to get ahead, or not? Only you will know.

name: Schrodinger's Cat Burglar
description: A puzzle heist adventure with a quantum flavour! The player controls Mittens the cat as she stumbles into a quantum experiment and gains incredible new powers - the ability to be in two places at once. Explore, solve logic puzzles and evade capture by pest control robots to ultimately save the day!

name: Rogue Nova
description: An intense, fast-paced real time strategy space opera, with a cast of colourful characters through a planet hopping adventure. Do you have what it takes to escape the relentless Baron protect of Princess Valeria?

name: Rock A Bye
description: "Rock a Bye" is a cute 3D platformer where you play as a baby, bouncing, dashing, and collecting outfits in 5 dreamy worlds.

name: Runes
description: Runes is a single player fantasy open world rpg. You take on the roles of both Talesin, a flawed sorcerer, and Olwyna, a head-strong young thief, as they investigate the origins of a mysterious new potion in the town of Lewyst.

name: Shlob
description: Sword Fight with your friends as goopy beans in Shlob. Use a unique and expansive locomotion system to get around the arenas! Skate, Jump & Boost yourself around as you learn about each arena's gimmick and fight to become the best Shloblet in Shlobtopia!

name: Sirius-4
description: "Sirius-4" is a plot-oriented space simulator that gives the player complete freedom of action as a hired pilot of the "Sirius" unit. The action takes place on the outskirts of human space during a turbulent time for the galaxy after a global war.

name: Shipwrecked
description: Explore, craft and fight your way on the uncharted islands! Shipwrecked is an Action-RPG where you will build your base, craft useful tools to survive and even use magic!

name: Sexual Sword Master
description: Engage in 2D action swordplay and deflect your opponent's attacks! Earn points in battles and level up! After the matches, go on dates with beautiful girls! And then... even more... ♡ High-quality H-animations with Live2D technology! Five charming girls are awaiting your challenge!

name: Shadows Of Deceit
description: Shadows of Deceit is a next-gen horror and psychological thriller game developed with Unreal Engine 5. While you are getting a chill down your spine with the impressive story and realistic locations, you will also witness the mystery behind Janet's story.

name: Scorching Desert
description: "Scorching Desert" is an open-world survival crafting game, where your main objective is to survive in a hot, unforgiving desert plagued by an ancient evil! You will need to gather resources, build a resillient shelter, stay hydrated & explore a massive 64km^2 Map!

name: Scrapbooking
description: Scrapbooking is relaxing game for all lovers of Scrapbooking and handicraft. Make your own scrapbooking masterpiece!

name: SD Dungeons
description: Create your own character and go on a great adventure! Randomly generated dungeons at each level and gates that affect the difficulty of where you go await you! Can you get powerful weapons and gems and escape without running out of power?

name: Soggy Beans
description: Fish will come, fish will go. Take photos, collect beans, decorate your seascape, then relax or do other things while your friends swim by in this calming side-idler.

name: Slimewest
description: Face off against an invasion of slimes in this 2D roguelite with pixel art graphics. Play alone or with up to 4 friends and save the city from the devouring attack of these creatures. Get your weapon ready and embark on this bang bang western style adventure. Play now and prove your mettle!

name: Starkheim Tournament
description: Starkheim Tournament is a simplified 2D fighting game set in fantasy universe with a pixel-art style. With only two primary attack buttons, and controls that do not require any complicated motions, Starkheim Tournament aims to be easy to pick up and only just moderate to master.

name: Stardawn Heroes
description: Stardawn Heroes is a rogue-lite action adventure RPG set throughout the stars. Explore, battle, harvest, and craft your way through procedurally generated planets on your journey to the Gateway of the Ancients.

name: Steam Shot
description: Load, aim, and blast your friends and enemies away in this fun and fast paced VR steam punk WW1 era artillery shooter! Steam Shot offers a unique VR experience with physics-based controls, multiplayer, and huge cannons placed on top of controllable steam mechs!

name: Steel Aces
description: The upcoming historically accurate tank shooter with iconic vehicles from the inception of tanks to the modern era!

name: EV2: Earth Version 2
description: EV2 is a Open World, looter-shooter set in the frontier where cutting-edge technology meets the remnants of an ancient civilization. Defend humanity against a relentless global infestation of the Hive.

name: Team of Bravery
description: Team of Bravery is an action roguelike dungeon crawler Team RPG adventure game.Gather your team ,Level up your Team members and Exploring dangerous Dungeons.Survirve and Loot legendary Items and Treasure ~Fight your way out in the Greatest Adventure!

name: Sweet Dreams
description: Your soul are chosen! Face off with great 6 very different from each other bosses! Use excellent weapons to beat enemies, discover secrets, solve puzzles and buy things from the shop of Wizar!

name: Super 10 Pin
description: Strike your way through a wild world of bowling in Super 10 Pin! Use special abilities to jump, boost, and explode your way down unbelievable N64-styled bowling lanes in this wacky arcade bowling game!

name: Supermurgitroid
description: Faced with difficult, or sometimes impossible, 2d platforming challenges, spend your precious time limit to alter the level. Well actually pay someone else to do it. Then try to traverse through the modified level in the time you left yourself.

name: The Dark Whispers
description: The Dark Whispers is a chilling descent into madness, a haunting tale of one detective's relentless pursuit of the truth. Will you brave the darkness and uncover the horrifying secrets that lie hidden within, or will you become just another lost soul in its malevolent embrace?

name: The Fourth Sense Evolution: Stone Age
description: Top View, 2D, Evolution, Survival, and Cult game. "Be a God, Evolve Followers, and Spread Your Faith: A Stone Age Sandbox Game"

name: Undead Uprising
description: "Undead Uprising" immerses you in a post-apocalyptic world swarming with zombies. Battle through endless waves of the undead. Continuously evolving, the game offers regular updates and fresh content. The fate of humanity rests in your hands. Are you ready?

name: Unispies: Chapter 1 - Havana Cuba
description: A group of smart, latin american, attractive female hackers steal 2 billion of bitcoin from a communist dictator. Then their lives and family are targeted by the dictator for that crime. The team of girls are rescued by Omar, an ex Mi-6 British agent who runs the Spies for Hire team called Unico.

name: Abandoned Dark
description: The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements where you play as a chick trying to go through dark depth. You need to go through different levels along the way, destroying enemies in the location and avoiding traps.

name: Adult Puzzle: My Pretty Neighbor Chloe
description: You should meet Chloe.Are you feeling stressed? Don't worry.I'm here to help you relax and brighten up your day with a classic puzzle game!

name: Cog: The Rogue Machine
description: Discover the secrets of a mysterious machine and the corporation excavating it for its precious resources in this rocket-fueled roguelike platformer!

name: VanimateApp
description: VanimateApp is a 3D, Real-Time, Physics-Based Character Sim. You can sexually interact with characters of all shapes and sizes using toys and other fun stuff. Play in First- and Third-person perspectives with fully physics-based gameplay and complete control.

name: Tmutarakan
description: A visual novel about the adventures of the young prince Oleg, the steppe princess Maryam, and the warrior Ivan on their journey to Tmutarakan.

name: Toi 2 Attack
description: Emperor Zaroc's forces invaded the planet Toi destroy the boss and regain control of the planet

name: The Skyland Chronicles
description: You are a bloody pirate. Will you make the most of it in the new world and fulfill your destiny? This is your battle, where you'll come face to face with dark creatures from Slavic mythology. Take on the role of a legendary warrior and decide if the world is worth saving.

name: Throw Anything: Radiation Zombies
description: Complete missions to save a world devastated by zombies, utilizing Arm Units and special abilities! Throw Anything: Radiation Zombies is a third-person shooter 3D-action roguelite game set in a world overrun by zombies, where you survive by throwing objects around. Equip a powerful Arm Unit, enhance yourself with a personalized skill tree, and explore a maze-like world!

name: Whispering Fears
description: A story about a game designer seeking to use artificial intelligence for the purpose of crafting an exceptional narrative within a game, until something unexpected happens.

name: Whispers Of Aether
description: Embark on an epic journey: Create, lead, and protect your organization, while facing perilous creatures in the mystical realm of Aether. Craft, manage, explore, and purge the land of evil.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh PokéDuel
description: This game is a mod for Pokemon Fire Red which replaces all the pokemon with iconic Yu-Gi-Oh monsters and includes pokemon mechanics up to gen 9.

name: Spiral of War
description: "Spiral of War" is a dynamic bullet-hell shooter infused with modern warfare. Inspired by "Vampire", "Battle Royale", and "LoL", it offers a fresh experience. After battles, equipment syncs to the cloud. Players face diverse foes, diving into epic brawls.

name: Ancient Wind Spread
description: The first work of an independent small team, many deficiencies, please do not hesitate to correct! We will fix and update your problems as soon as possible. The scholar's career is not good and he retires to the countryside. Intertwined with the fate of five different styles of women.

name: Ice Survival
description: A very casual and cute strategy game that uses your intelligence to crack all levels. This is only the first season, first edition

name: Kijin-mura no Kiken na Inshuu: Dangerous Village Tradition
description: The strange custom of "Onibarai" held in the village they moved to. The countryside life of the newlywed couple is infiltrated by the villagers' sinister intentions...!?

name: Shisya
description: Horror adventure game to appraise spirits photos

name: Space Time Ocean
description: Time and space foam island, unknown biological resources, construction base, adventure trip.

name: Almond Ridge
description: A short visual novel roleplaying game set in a nursing home where the residents have been going missing.

name: Tsykial
description: Tsykial is a teaser game containing various logs, data files and images related to Five Nights at Treasure Island.

name: Tyrannizer
description:
Tyrannizer is a first-person shooter game with a mix of sci-fi and fantasy elements, likely inspired by Quake. The player character uses a sword for a close-rangge weapon alongside modern era firearms, but the game is set in a medieval looking castle populated with mythical creatures.

The game was developed with the ACKNEX 3D GameStudio construction set, which is more similar to the Build 2.5D engine than to the true 3D Quake engine, and uses sprites for enemies, items and decorations. Build-engine like advanced features are used like bridges or balconies that can be walked on and passed under, and the ability to swim underwater.

name: Pathology
description: The goal of Pathology is simple. Get to the exit in the least number of moves. Pathology is a grid-based block pushing puzzle game focused on optimization.

name: Fire Emblem: Deity Device
description:
Deity Device is a heavily story driven romhack of Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones created by the user Permafrost. The game begins with a young noblewoman on a pilgrimage with her band of knights, but she is diverted when her brother is kidnapped, gradually being drawn into the larger plot. Both the gameplay and story are strongly inspired by Genealogy of the Holy War; with a focus on large maps and political schemes.

The game features:
-39 Main Story Chapters and 10 Gaiden Chapters
-A smaller more developed cast of 26 playable units
-An all new magic system

name: Perfect Bird Pitch
description:
Save chicks with a cute black cat! Guess and identify its parent birds with its voice. All you need is so-called perfect pitch!

The appearance of the chicks is all white and unrecognizable, but they are to chirp in the same pitch as their parent birds.

The black cat felt benevolent toward the chicks that dropped down due to the strong wind and decided to look for its parent birds.

By the time you have done the entire game, you will have developed a nearly absolute pitch sense.

name: Arcadrome
description: Dark time for the Human race has come. The Earth is in danger. Aliens are going to capture planet Earth (as they always are). It's clear to see that they are ugly, loathsome, vile and have the worst designs of all conquerers. Women will be eaten away, the brains of intelligent men will be worked into liquid assigned to wash their nasty spaceships, children will be taken away for terrible experiments.

name: Hop Island
description: An upcoming puzzle game by minidavid.

name: Kaze no Tansakusha 2: Shadow Kingdom
description: The direct sequel to Kaze no Tansakusha: Grand Slam. It retains the series' tabletop-inspired aesthetics, with characters depicted as figurines on a game board.

name: ODR Hockey Heroes
description: ODR Hockey Heroes is a brand new arcade hockey video game featuring ultra-smooth pick-up-and-play controls that'll have you scoring goals and laying hitz like a true legend.

name: Fisherman’s Bait: Marlin Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: 13 Rosas
description:
A first-person horror adventure game for Android.

A virtual memorial for the lack of physical ones.

A reminder of the disgusting spirit of the assassins. See how ravenous they become when they fear our freedom.

Dedicated to the forgotten ones on the side of my country's roads. And to the thirteen women. Executed to give example, they became an unspoken symbol for everything that is worth fighting for.

¡Viva la República!

name: Skybreakers
description: Choose from a variety of classes, arm yourself with a vast array of weapons, and create your own unique build by combining treasures, random talents, cultivation methods, and bonds. Use unique abilities to defeat a variety of monsters, demons, and devils.

name: Di Gi Charat RPG
description: Di Gi Charat RPG is a Korean exclusive mobile game based on the anime Di Gi Charat.

name: Got Cha Mini Game Festival 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Meta Lordz
description: Meta Lordz is a web3 free-to-play competitive game set in the mythical world of Glasmire, inspired by Norse and Viking tales. The game features MOBA-style combat focusing on precise skillshots, which is presented in a team-based game mode that combines thrilling Boss battles with objectives similar to capture-the-flag, creating a unique gaming experience.

name: Rush City
description: Endless runner addictive fun from the developer of the #1 smash hit game Air Hockey! You are the sole survivor, hunted by evil humans...you must escape from Rush City! Jump from rooftop to rooftop, dodge helicopters, run as fast as you can! Buff up with piles of challenging objectives & use super powers to out score your friends!

name: Crazy Little Jumper
description:
You control a little dude. In his way there are many obstacles, but his only ability is to jump. This is where he needs your help. You make him jump by tapping the screen.
You can do two types of jumps: small jumps for small obstacles, and big jumps for big obstacles.
Through the levels you will need good timing and pure attention. There are 3 different worlds with total 63 action packed levels. Also, watch for holes, bounce pads, force fields and speed zones.
This game is fast, fun, addictive… and easy to play and easy to enjoy.

name: Flying Doggy
description:
Doggy doesn't like birds.
The birds always are teasing Doggy and run away.
Doggy want to pursue them but he can't fly.
One day, Doggy dreamed about flying in the sky.
Doggy can fly in his dream!
Now is the time to catch the birds!

name: Low and Furious
description: Low and Furious is a thrilling driving game set in a Brazilian map that lets you customize your dream car and participate in exciting races and role-playing missions. With stunning graphics and engaging gameplay, BDQ is a must-play for racing game and car customization enthusiasts.

name: Into Arith
description: Embark on a journey to unravel the mysteries of your past within the enchanting, dark world of Arith. Explore the depths of your own memories in this evocative point-and-click adventure.

name: DeadHex
description: DeadHex is an action packed fusion of MOBA and FPS, battling head-to-head to destroy your rival's headquarters. Command minions, crush towers, and wield artifacts in intense duels.

name: Into the Depths of Despair
description: Into the Depths of Despair is a first-person psychological horror game. You navigate through endless mine shafts, searching for a way out while trying to stay alive. You are not alone!

name: Tempest Inc.
description: Tempest Inc. is a 2D pixel art shoot-em-up focusing on characters and using their ship's unique abilities to fight through dynamic enemy engagements and boss battles!

name: Icaria
description: Automate a team of robots to gather resources, scale up production, reshape terrain, and expand your colony on a procedurally generated alien world.

name: TaskTwist
description: Bored with regular chores? In the VR simulation game TaskTwist, even cleaning can become a shocking adventure! Dive in and see if you can conquer the house without getting zapped!

name: Sekala
description: Experience a gripping narrative journey in this survival horror hack-and-slash adventure. Follow Kala, a college student trapped in a trauma related to death, as he tries to survive encounters with morbid creatures.

name: Dinolords
description: Dinolords is a realtime strategy game where you gather resources, build fortifications and command units in defence against the invading Danes with their arsenal of fierce dinosaurs. A shocking new age in medieval warfare.

name: The Last Bot
description: Play as a lone robot exploring a post-human world where nature has overtaken cities of towering skyscrapers. Unearth the forgotten legacy of your creators by reviving your sole companions - long dormant, malfunctioning robots - each holding a key to both the past and humanity's fate.

name: The Shopping Dead
description: In The Shopping Dead, brave the undead-infested aisles in this 2D arcade frenzy! Memorize lists, dodge zombies, and gather items under pressure. Earn currency, buy power-ups, and outshop the apocalypse. Will your reflexes make the checkout, or will you be left behind?

name: Chained Cucumber
description: Chained bean is action game with little bit of horror element , where your enemy is very bouncy.

name: Reverse Dungeon
description: Make yourself a keeper of an ancient tomb. Protect your treasure from pesky heroes in any way you can — set traps, create cliffs, make surfaces slippery. Or let your friends become adventurers and show them the full power of the Reverse Dungeon!

name: Augmented Brutality
description: Augmented Brutality is a lightning fast, hyperviolent top-down shooter in a nightmarish techno-industrial setting. Shoot, dismember, head-stomp and door-kick your way through dozens of handcrafted levels using any edge you can find to tilt the impossible odds to your favor. It's time to get bloody.

name: Faye Freelance: Rebel Reporter
description: Faye Freelance: Rebel Reporter is a brand new NEWSVANIA that combines the nostalgic charm of pixel platformers with the spirit of Journalism in a stylish twist. Face your foes not with guns and blades, but with pen and ink! Featuring stylized pixel-art aesthetic and hand-crafted animation.

name: Himiko's Journey
description: Embark on an epic adventure, where every card you play, every decision you make, and every roll of the dice shapes your destiny. Will you conquer the challenges that lie ahead and emerge victorious on "Himiko's Journey"?

name: Xenoterrestrial
description: Time and date are not important. Aliens have boarded a military vessel deep in space. Little do they know, #T217, a combat clone onboard the dreadnought, has been waiting for them. Use a wealth of weapons and mechanics to eliminate them with expert precision.

name: The Masquerade
description: The Masquerade is a murder party game from 2 to 8 players. Impersonate NPCs to hide from your stalker, while gathering enough clues to unmask your target.

name: Clone Knights
description: Clone Knights is a platform game. Navigate across various platforms using high jumps and get to the end of the level to get to the next, much more difficult one. Lead your army to victory and watch your step, sire.

name: Halloween Survivors
description: Halloween brings all of your worst nightmares to life! Slaughter hordes of Halloween slashers, monsters, demons, and cosmic horrors! This Halloween, experience the ultimate bullet-heaven gameplay in... HELL!!!

name: A Hero's Legacy
description: Lenz is a kind and charismatic young man who will embark on this fantasy journey in a vast world, full of incredible adventures to explore, and several secrets to uncover!

name: Merchant's Odyssey
description: Step into the shoes of a young merchant on a journey where you'll trade goods, recruit a diverse array of mercenaries, engage in tactical combat, and make critical decisions that shape both your path and the unfolding story.

name: Neuralgia
description: Assume the role of Blake Jensen, the CEO of Creative Edge, a renowned company known for its groundbreaking innovations. You unknowingly stumble upon a sinister plot of revenge. Jeffrey Howes, a former employee you sacked, nurses a deep-seated grudge against you.

name: Guardian Maia
description: Guardian Maia is a 3rd person action-adventure game set in 2750 where the world of science fiction and traditional Indigenous Māori culture collide. Journey across New Zealand’s unforgiving South Island fighting ruthless warriors to find three kete (baskets) which hold the key to saving your people.

name: Ayano's Lovesick Labyrinth
description: Ayano's Lovesick Labyrinth is a cancelled crossover spinoff game between Dark Deception and Yandere Simulator. The game was cancelled in September 2023 due to controversy relating to YandereDev.

name: Derpixon x FNF
description: Derpixon x FNF is a pornographic mod for Friday Night Funkin'.

name: Paddle Protectors
description: Build your colony. Establish defense lines, trenches and fortifications.

name: Avant-Garde
description: Avant-Garde is a game reenacting historical battles in real time in which you must face the same conditions and resources available at the time. Take place as the leader of either army, simulate, understand and challenge history through authentic battles!

name: Ghost Seeker Hunter Simulation
description: Immerse yourself in the dark world of Ghost Seeker - Hunter Simulation, an exciting supernatural adventure. Take on the role of a ghost hunter, exploring abandoned houses in search of spirits. Uncover the secrets of the paranormal, confront your fears, and become a true ghost hunter.

name: Hellheim: A Norse Saga
description: Hellheim: A Norse Saga is a gripping first-person action game that takes you on an immersive journey through the depths of Norse mythology. Step into the role of Einar, a battle-hardened Danish warrior, as you traverse the treacherous realm of Helheim in search of redemption and freedom.

name: Soul Stitcher
description: Explore the deepest Dungeons in this thrilling roguelike action game. Collect souls in the name of the evil God. Fall and come back again and again because it's your destiny to serve for eternity. Stay alive in these challenging missions, or die and rise for more!

name: Super Minecraft 64 DS
description: Sin descripción

name: The Super Mario Bros. Movie 64 DS
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Among Us 64 DS
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario's Holiday
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario 256
description: Sin descripción

name: Boobytales
description: A doujin 1v1 fighting game featuring several animal characters, created with 2D Fighter Maker '95. The version available online is labelled "Test Version +", but is unfinished. Most of the fighters are playable, but some (Byufero, Tarshow & Need) are unfinished.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Rogue Core
description: DEEP ROCK GALACTIC: ROGUE CORE is a 1-4 player co-op FPS roguelite featuring 100% destructible environments and procedurally-generated caves. Join a team of dwarven Reclaimers tasked with reestablishing control over lost deep mining operations on Hoxxes IV.

name: Broforce: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Terminator: Resistance - Complete Edition: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: 4x4 Mud: Offroad Car Simulator & Truck
description: Sin descripción

name: Ride 5: Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Train Valley Collection: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Talisman: Digital Edition - 40th Anniversary Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: 90 Minute Fever
description: 90 Minute Fever is an online football management game that offers extremely challenging gameplay where you get to compete against others from all over the world!

name: Shrapnel
description: Shrapnel is the newest first-person extraction shooter, developed by BAFTA and Emmy award-winning game industry veterans at NEON. SHRAPNEL has a rich set of player-creation tools, combining creation, curation, and connection into a game where players own the platform.

name: Jack Nicklaus Cyber Golf
description: An unreleased game for the Atari Jaguar.

name: Slam Racer
description: An unreleased racing game for the Atari Jaguar.

name: Tiny Toon Adventures: Plucky Duck in Hollywood Hijinks
description: An unreleased game for the Atari Jaguar.

name: Phase Zero
description: Phase Zero is an unreleased action-shooter video game that was in development by Hyper Image Productions and originally planned to be published by Atari Corporation on a scheduled September 1995 release date exclusively for the Atari Jaguar. It was the only game in development by Hyper Image. Assuming the role of a newcomer pilot from the titular squadron assigned to fight against an rival organization only known as The Collective in a foreign planet, players take control of a windowless VTV hovertank craft called Hunter in order to complete a series of missions and tasks, while battling against enemy VTV hovertanks. Hyper Image was originally working on a top-down shooter for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System, before the team later moved to the Jaguar with Phase Zero and opted to use their own interpretation of the heightmap technique to render the landscapes and visuals, in addition of also placing emphasis on LAN play for multiplayer.

name: Native
description: A DAZZLING GAME OF COSMIC ENCOUNTER! The final showdown has begun! At the controls of your powerful interstellar craft, you maneuver into enemy territory. Your mission: to destroy the evil forces who have held the cosmos in fear and relentless suffering. It's a fight to death against an uncommon cadre of space oddities - gigantic slithering serpents, whirling space bugs and fantastic galactic warships. Can you endure the onslaught in the Atari Jaguar's finest 2D shoot'em up? The fate of the cosmos is in your hands... Horizontal and vertical scrolling in 60 frames per Second! Transparency and lightning effects show the power of the Jaguar! Over 100 objects simultaneous on screen - a shooter's nightmare!

name: Thea Realm Fighters
description: A cancelled fighting game for the Atari Jaguar. It was developed by High Voltage Software, but never released officially.

name: Virtual VCS
description:
An unreleased Atari 2600 game compilation for the Atari Jaguar. It contains:

-Combat
-Pac Man
-Adventure
-Yar's Revenge
-Defender
-Berzerk

name: Zzyorxx II
description: Zzyorxx II is an unreleased arcade-style scrolling shooter game similar to Axelay and Life Force where players take control of two distinct spacecraft through five stages set across different time periods, each one featuring their own thematic and alternating between horizontal and vertical scrolling, while fighting against enemies and bosses.
